performances.venue: Great American Music Hall San Francisco, CA
performances.description: The classic One From The Vault version
Out of this world instrumental version with both Ned Lagin and Merl Saunders sitting in
Long, stretched out great jamming.  Serious "Stronger than Dirt" in the middle of it all.  Beautiful.
Gorgeous blues for allah jam.  anytime Blues for Allah is even mentioned is heady.  ThePhil and Friends as well as the furthur versions are worth ckng

performances.venue: Marin County Civic Center San Rafael, CA
performances.description: Made for a real cool space!
Wow some crazy cool stuff, I am obsessed with Blues for allah so this is essential to me. Got lucky and saw furthur play at Mann in Philly.
